HRDatabase(self, database_path)

HRDatabase class

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

| Name                     | Type   | Description                             |
|--------------------------|--------|-----------------------------------------|
| watersystem, WaterSystem |        | Water system of the dike trajectory     |
| locations, list          |        | List with all locations in the database |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [check_location](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.check_location) | Check if a hrdlocation exists within the database |
| [create_location](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.create_location) | Creates a location based upon the Settings object |
| [get_location](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_location) | Returns the Location class of a hrdlocation. |
| [get_location_names](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_location_names) | Return a list of all hrdlocations in the database |
| [get_settings](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_settings) | Returns the Settings class of a hrdlocation |
| [get_water_system](#pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_water_system) | A method that returns the water system corresponding to the trajectory. |

### check_location { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.check_location }

```python
HRDatabase.check_location(hrdlocation)
```

Check if a hrdlocation exists within the database

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type   | Description                   | Default    |
|-------------|--------|-------------------------------|------------|
| hrdlocation | str    | The hrdlocation (uitvoerpunt) | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------------------|
|        | bool   | Whether the hrdlocation is in the database |

### create_location { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.create_location }

```python
HRDatabase.create_location(settings)
```

Creates a location based upon the Settings object

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type     | Description                       | Default    |
|----------|----------|-----------------------------------|------------|
| settings | Settings | The Settings object of a location | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type     | Description                                |
|--------|----------|--------------------------------------------|
|        | Location | The Location object for the given settings |

### get_location { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_location }

```python
HRDatabase.get_location(hrdlocation)
```

Returns the Location class of a hrdlocation.
Uses the default set of parameters.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type   | Description                   | Default    |
|-------------|--------|-------------------------------|------------|
| hrdlocation | str    | The hrdlocation (uitvoerpunt) | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type     | Description                             |
|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
|        | Location | The Location object for the hrdlocation |

### get_location_names { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_location_names }

```python
HRDatabase.get_location_names()
```

Return a list of all hrdlocations in the database

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type        | Description                     |
|--------|-------------|---------------------------------|
|        | list\[str\] | List with all hrdlocation names |

### get_settings { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_settings }

```python
HRDatabase.get_settings(hrdlocation)
```

Returns the Settings class of a hrdlocation
Useful for when you manually want to adjust the settings
To create a location using the settings use the function 'create_location(settings)'

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type   | Description                   | Default    |
|-------------|--------|-------------------------------|------------|
| hrdlocation | str    | The hrdlocation (uitvoerpunt) | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type     | Description                             |
|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------|
|        | Settings | The Settings object for the hrdlocation |

### get_water_system { #pydra_core.HRDatabase.get_water_system }

```python
HRDatabase.get_water_system()
```

A method that returns the water system corresponding to the trajectory.

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type        | Description                    |
|--------|-------------|--------------------------------|
|        | WaterSystem | Water system of the trajectory |
